name: TheBrotherTimothyClarkPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open brother timothy clark”
”Alexa, ask brother timothy clark for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start brother timothy clark”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: brother timothy clark
des:
Welcome and thanks for listening to the Brother Timothy Clark Podcast. 
 Many ask me, "What kind of a show do you do exactly?" I usually respond with something like, "it's truly a variety." "We go from topic to topic." 
 And so we do and you are welcome to join us on this randomness many of you know and love. 
 I am so thankful that this Podcast has lasted as long as it has. I've just put so much into it and here we are now with our own skill for our Alexa enabled devices. How cool is that? 
 Ok, so, about the skill itself. 
 If you want to go to older episodes, you say, "Alexa, previous." Then likewise, to go to newor episodes you simply say, "alexa, next." 
 If you have any problems with this skill, feel free to send me an email. 
 TimothyClarkMusic@me.com 

 My website is 
 timothyclarkmusic.wordpress.com 

 and I am Timothy, thanking you for checking out the Brother Timothy Clark Podcast.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
